<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create Subnets</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/subnets"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve a list of subnets associated with the user's account.
You may not have services or there may not be funds on your balance to complete this operation.
